dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents rivers in the Republic of the Congo. The data is created from 'LANDSAT ETM+' image which the GLCF project of the Maryland state university offers, Vmaplevel0, and the geographic information in which acquisition at spot is possible.Global Map data were developed under the cooperation of National Geospatial Information Authorities (NGIAs) of respective countries and regions.
dc_publisher_s: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
dc_creator_sm: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
Centre de recherche g√©ographique et de production cartographique (Brazzaville, Congo)
